description: All Greek airports are now taking flights from abroad, as European countries further ease lockdowns.
title: Coronavirus: Greece restarts tourist flights as Europe reopens further
title_page: Coronavirus: Greece restarts tourist flights as Europe reopens further - BBC News
maintext: Those arriving from abroad must fill out a mandatory form 48 hours before departure explaining where they came from and where they will be staying on arrival. Authorities are also conducting swab tests for arrivals.
